chmod.description: Execute `chmod` on the selected files to change their mode

diff.description: Diff the selected file with the hovered file, create a living patch, and copy it to the clipboard

full-border.description: Add a full border to Yazi to make it look fancier

git.description: Show the status of Git file changes as linemode in the file list

jump-to-char.description: Vim-like `f<char>`, jump to the next file whose name starts with `<char>`

lsar.description: Previewing archive contents with `lsar`, which is something you might not want to use anyway

mactag.description: Bring macOS's awesome tagging feature to Yazi

mime-ext.description: Mime-type provider based on a file extension database, replacing the [builtin `file(1)`](https://github.com/sxyazi/yazi/blob/main/yazi-plugin/preset/plugins/mime.lua) to speed up mime-type retrieval at the expense of accuracy

mount.description: Mount manager for Yazi, providing disk mount, unmount, and eject functionality

piper.description: Pipe any shell command as a previewer

smart-enter.description: [`Open`][open] files or [`enter`][enter] directories all in one key

smart-filter.description: Yazi plugin that makes filters smarter: continuous filtering, automatically enter unique directory, open file on submitting

smart-paste.description: Paste files into the hovered directory or to the CWD if hovering over a file

sudo-demo.description: Just an example showing how to use `sudo` in a Yazi plugin, and the plugin itself doesn't offer any features beyond logging a message

toggle-pane.description: Toggle the show, hide, and maximize states for different panes: parent, current, and preview

vcs-files.description: Show Git file changes in Yazi
